description: Phosphotyrosine status were compared between colorectal cancer cells which is sensitive or resistant to Cetuximab. Activated kinases in resistant cells were examined as targets to overcome the resistance.

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: Phosphotyrosine, Colorectal cancer, Drug resistance, Kinome

title: pY-IP of Colorectal cancer cells
